# marksman-lsp

Markdown language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence features like go-to-definition, find references, and symbol navigation.

## Supported Extensions
`.md`, `.markdown`

## Installation

Install Marksman via Homebrew:

```bash
brew install marksman
```

Or download from releases:
- [Marksman Releases](https://github.com/artempyanykh/marksman/releases)

## Verification

Check that Marksman is installed:

```bash
marksman --version
```

## More Information
- [Marksman on GitHub](https://github.com/artempyanykh/marksman)
- [Marksman Documentation](https://github.com/artempyanykh/marksman/wiki)
